DuplicateRecordException - Exception in in.co.rays.exception
DuplicateRecordException is a custom checked exception used to indicate that a duplicate record exists when trying to add or update data.
DuplicateRecordException(String) - Constructor for exception in.co.rays.exception.DuplicateRecordException
Constructs a new DuplicateRecordException with the specified detail message.
